Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the series opener by five wickets
Dunith Wellalage took three wickets in the match
Matheesha Pathirana also got a wicket to his name
Springer was caught at deep mid-wicket by Hasaranga
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies struggled with the turn and bounce
Sri Lanka’s spinners performed exceptionally well
West Indies were bowled out for their 4th lowest total in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka said it’s an important win for them
He credits Dunith Wellalage’s performance and the openers’ contribution
Pathum Nissanka, MAN OF THE MATCH, says he had a special plan against the spin bowlers
Rovman Powell says they did well to restrict Sri Lanka to 160 and adds the wicket wasn’t at its best
Miscellaneous Highlights: The toss was crucial for Sri Lanka
Sri Lanka’s openers set the tone for the innings
The game was a thumping win for Sri Lanka
The conditions in Dambulla were cool with low chances of rain
